com.mappedin.sdk

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mappedin.sdk.Instruction

  • public class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object
    An instruction for a user to get from one Node to another. It will have a Node it happens at, an Action (depart, arrive, turn, take vortex), and optional Locations to perform this "at" or "towards", as well as a String representing the text instructions to display to the user. The "at/towardsLocation" properties are to let you mark or highlight key reference locations on the MapView if they will help the user find or keep their bearings.
